nodes.text: Tarkazza (meaning "mist ghost" in Shyriiwook) was a male Wookiee, with a silver stripe down his back, who was the father of Katarra. He once took Han Solo beneath Rwookrrorro by placing him in a quulaar on his back.
Tarkazza was one of the Wookiees who spearheaded the search for the Gran thief Kea Ra-Lan after she infiltrated Kashyyyk and stole ancient texts from the vaults of Neocomora.
